subject: fix: apply author identity mapping in aggregation
body:
The author-map.json config existed but wasn't being used during data aggregation. Now the aggregate script:

- Loads config/author-map.json at startup
- Resolves raw emails to canonical author IDs
- Normalizes author_id in all commits
- Merges contributor stats by canonical ID
- Includes metadata.authors for dashboard resolution

Result: jacotheron87's two email addresses are now properly merged into a single contributor (4 total instead of 5).
